Text: Itali fʼo̩la ka, e̩re̩ o̩kogu o̩kogu nachʼekuku,
Tak abo du ku ma kejurʼe̩ ara bʼe̩ te̩, oñ ma akakini,
Ma muda mʼu ño̩ kwʼo̩mo̩ kpo̩,
Aku aku-we̩ du dab oli o̩gbaikolo
Go, amone̩-we̩ ku ma jʼalumeji-we̩ le̩
Fʼomiofo kpa ñw o̩la-we̩ gbe̩gba ku ma kpala nyʼuwe̩,
Uwe̩ je̩ ñw amanyaja-we̩ ku ma wewe
Ugbo ki awʼe̩ nʼenye̩do̩ ge̩ n,
